thread.title: Tourist recreates planking on a travelator, calls it 'the sidewalk spin'
thread.title_full: Tourist recreates planking on a travelator, calls it 'the sidewalk spin'

title: Tourist recreates planking on a travelator, calls it 'the sidewalk spin'
text:
Tourist recreates planking on a travelator, calls it 'the sidewalk spin' Last updated 05:00, October 17 2015 Break Clips/YouTube 
Tourists are putting a new spin on the planking craze in what has been dubbed 'the sidewalk spin'. 
Just when you thought planking was officially dead, it appears to have been reincarnated by a tourist - who is putting a whole new spin on it. 
In a video titled "The best way to use a moving sidewalk", a young man can be seen planking on the arm rest of a travelator at a Universal theme park. 
But in a twist on the original pose, he uses the conveyor belts to spin his body around in circles. It has been dubbed "the sidewalk spin". Facebook 
Prime Minister John Key and his son Max demonstrate the original planking form.
